sentences.sentence: The value of Britain keep stable between 2010 and 2013; while America, Dutch and Japan decrease greatly with steady steps between 2010 and 2013.

sentences.sentence: The value of Britain keep stable between 2010 and 2013; while America, Dutch and Japan decrease greatly with steady steps between 2010 and 2013.
